artist: Artist: Walter Hamady; Printer: The Perishable Press, Mount Horeb, Wis.; Publisher: The Perishable Press, Mount Horeb, Wis.
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
description: Bound volume with cloth over boards binding with repurposed color printed maps on covers;155 pp. (unpaginated)
markings: Numbered with black ink stamp, first page (unpaginated) after the flyleaf: No. 083 (numbered at least 18 additional times throughout the book)
medium: Printed typographical elements, collage, rubber stamps, metal grommets, photographs, maps, letterpress, and handwork; bound volume
provenance: The Perishable Press, Ltd., Mt. Horeb, Wis.; sold to MIA, 1997.
signed: Inscribed and initialed by the artist in pencil on the first page (unpaginated) after the flyleaf: CASED IN / BY WSHH | Signed, dated, and notated in pencil, page 130 (unpaginated), bottom center: walter samuel haatoum hamady 29 VI 96 15:43 [signed by the artist eight addtional times throughout the book]
title: Travelling or Interminable Gabberjabb No. 7
